summary: The AINetIndexUtils class includes methods for indexing and searching concepts, time sequences, absolute matching, range-limited search, reference ports, and sparse data dictionaries. It also declares a method to insert a dictionary at a specific location and returns the value difference between two values.

details.comment: This code defines a class AINetIndexUtils that provides methods for indexing and searching concepts and time sequences. The class has a general absolute matching method, which takes in content, sort preferences, exclusion preferences, and optional parameters to retrieve reference ports. It also supports limiting the range of the search.
This code defines two methods for getting absolute matching from specified ranges, a method for searching index models, and another method for retrieving sparse data dictionaries.

This code declares a method that inserts a data dictionary at a specific location and returns the value difference between two values. The method takes a dictionary, a location string, a dataset string, an output flag, and a value info object as parameters. It calculates the value difference for a given location and dataset.
